metadata.name: WinSxS Executable File Creation By Non-System Process
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of binaries in the WinSxS folder by non-system processes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\winsxs\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.exe')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\systems32\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\winsxs\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of binaries in the WinSxS folder by non-system processes
